ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Shows different renderable series in polar chart
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates the many kinds of Polar chart (Polar Line, Polar Column, Polar Area) available in SciChart, and allows MS Excel style changing of data-presentation dynamically.
The Polar Chart is not defined by a series, but actually a special Polar Axis type. Most of the SciChart RenderableSeries have been converted to work with Polar Charts.
[b][i]Tips![/i][/b]
To change chart type - just select select chart in the list.
